name: Diamonds are Forever
text: When the four thieves stole precious rocks from the small store they left before the law could get to the scene.

name: A Good Haul
text: In the house of capitalism the four thieves stole a large amount of valuables before making their escape.

name: I Will Pass Through Walls
text: Under the cover of night and shadows the thieves stole many bags of valuables and not a single drop of blood was spilled.

name: All Eggs in One Basket
text: The four thieves placed their loot in the street, then a large bird came and took it all in one single swoop.

name: Hostage Situation
text: The four thieves guarded the innocent until they made their escape with the valuable bounty from the house of carbon.

name: But Wait - There’s More
text: From a well guarded transport the Four Thieves found out about a secret shipment containing a valuable weapon.

name: We’re Gonna Need a Bigger Boat
text: As The four thieves stole the valuable weapon they also took all the munitions they could find.

name: Self Checkout
text: When the four thieves were asked to destroy a large store their actions were as fast as they were devastating

name: Platinum Card (Or: “Yeah, He’s a Gold Digger”)
text: The four thieves strolled down the street cleaning out each stop they passed despite every effort the law couldn’t stop them.

name: What’s in the Box?
text: Great value rained from the sky and the four thieves opened any packages in their quest for riches

name: Let’s do th...
text: The four thieves stole a valuable head ornament so fast that no one had a chance to react.

name: They Don't Pay Us Enough
text: The four thieves were asked to steal something very dangerous they took everything of value and left nothing behind.

name: Bring It Back Safe
text: As the earth shook the four thieves stole ten boxes of great value.

name: Let Them Boogie
text: As people were dancing to the music the four thieves crept through the shadows and stole what was locked away.

name: The Grinch
text: As the snow fell, the fours thieves attacked a large store and took everything of value.

name: Out of bounds
text: The four thieves were surrounded on the docks but they kept their enemies away from the loot until it was all sent away

name: Lord of War
text: On the day that burned the four thieves absconded with all the elements of death.

name: Full Measure
text: In an old abandoned house the four thieves made as much blue as they could with the resources available.

name: Doctor Fantastic
text: The four thieves with all their wit could identify the mechanism they needed to steal with the greatest of ease.

name: I Wasn't Even There!
text: Under the cover of darkness the four thieves quietly stole the valuable metal and replaced it with white dust.

name: I'm A Swinger
text: The four thieves influenced the world around them and changed the course of society without anyone ever find out.

name: Don't bring the Heat
text: The four thieves robbed the largest bank ever built without alerting the law.

name: Walk Faster
text: A house full thugs and low lifes could not stop the four thieves from reaching their target.

name: Watch The Power Switch!
text: The four thieves held their ground as their friend worked and because of their efforts he was completely uninterrupted.

name: Silent But Deadly
text: When the four thieves were betrayed their revenge was precise and quiet no one knew they had been there until it was too late.

name: Cat Burglar
text: The four thieves stole a rare rock of great value and importance without anyone noticing that they were there.

name: High Roller
text: The four thieves attacked the house of smiles and fortune they quickly opened the vault and found their goal.

name: I've got the Power
text: By the docks the four thieves went about their business without interruptions.

name: Pump It Up
text: In the forest four thieves kept the pipe from their river intact.

name: Settling a Scar
text: The four thieves attacked the mansion with great speed and ferocity.

name: Sound of Silence
text: As the party was in full swing the four thieves went about their business and none ever knew they were there.

name: Dr. Evil
text: The four thieves once created for themselves a large fortune.

name: OVERDRILL
text: The hidden vault was hard to find and difficult to open but the four thieves worked together and claimed the legendary treasure.

name: Remember, No Russian
text: As the liquid turned to vapor the four thieves watched over the dead never letting their power by taken away thereby staving off the darkness.

name: Hazzard County
text: The four thieves stole goats and hidden treasures once the deed was done they quickly made their escape together.

name: Santa Slays Slackers
text: The four thieves guarded the packer as they prepared the next shipment even as the law came charging in.

name: Gone in 240 seconds
text: When stealing from the saddlers workshop the four thieves did so in a great hurry.

name: Full Throttle
text: The four thieves attacked a train in motion they quickly made it to the last cars to see what they were after and made it to their escape.

name: Quick Draw
text: A room full of riches, a house full of thugs. The four thieves were quick and deadly and before anyone knew it all the thugs were dead.

name: A Rendezvous With Destiny
text: The four thieves made their way through the abandoned building and quickly found their charge.

name: Pacifish
text: The four thieves did not spill blood while on the boat.

name: Not Even Once
text: The four thieves interrupted a deal of great value but even though they were surrounded and cornered no one fell in the onslaught that followed.

name: Making a Statement
text: Surrounded, the four thieves overcame grave danger and escaped the house of massacre.

name: Clean House
text: The four thieves snuck into the mountain keep and they stole everything of value kept there.

name: 1...2...3... JUMP!
text: On the day they came in to the word flying through the heavens the four thieves all fell together.

name: It's Nice To Be Nice
text: The four thieves were surrounded in the street but they fought their way through the onslaught of enemies and not a single innocent was harmed.

name: Attacked Helicopter
text: As the four thieves rescued the incarcerated man. They shot the large bird that tried to stop them from sending them into safety.

name: The Fuel Must Flow
text: In a place of ice and snow, the four thieves made their vessel seaworthy without the guards being able to stop them.

name: Blood Diamond
text: The four thieves overcame incredible difficulties in obtaining the blood stained jewel.

name: Waste Not, Want Not
text: In the famous store for rings and rare stones the four thieves took everything of value despite the best efforts of the law.

name: All the Gold in Brooklyn
text: For every month in the year four thieves would take tribute from the institution.

name: Stalker
text: The four thieves understood the importance of never letting the quarry out of your sight until the task of destroying your nemesis complete.

name: Hack This!
text: As the four thieves emerged from the mountain they were met by a hail of bullets but they easily out matched their foes.

name: Press [F] to pay Respects
text: The four thieves found someone who deserved their respect.

name: Beacon of... nope
text: When the four thieves came to the aid of their long lost friend they knew darkness was their ally.

name: Keeping the Cool
text: In a place of healing the four thieves stole a vial of vile blood with speed and threats they keep all the people under control.

name: The Pacifist
text: While Stealing A bomb from a train the four thieves did not spill a single drop of blood
